name: Window Back Chairs - Set of 2, Black Metal / Black Vinyl Seat

reviews.name: Window Back Chairs - Set of 2, Black Metal / Black Vinyl Seat
reviews.reviewText:
I'm so happy with my purchase.

These chairs are very study (made of metal, although they look like dark wood from afar#, and the vinyl seating is very comfortable #looks like leather). The chairs are very modern and look great in my apartment.

The chairs were super easy to put together since they come assembled! All you need to do is screw on the vinly seating. I had purchased a glass table from another store and these chairs compliment it very well.

I have a feeling these chairs will last me for a long time, and for the price, you really can't beat this type of quality.
reviews.title: Modern, Sturdy Chairs. Can't Beat the Price

reviews.name: Window Back Chairs - Set of 2, Black Metal / Black Vinyl Seat
reviews.reviewText: I really like these chairs. I bought four to match my black table, also from walmart. My only complaint is they didn't come with directions. I couldn't figure out how to screw the cushions onto the chair, so I just sat them on the frame and it still works out. They're sturdy and comfortable.
reviews.title: nice and pretty

reviews.name: Window Back Chairs - Set of 2, Black Metal / Black Vinyl Seat
reviews.reviewText: We bought 6 chairs. You will need to attach the seat pads, and you are good to go. I love my chairs. They are beautiful, sturdy, and met all my expectations & more. They look awesome with my table. Great deal for your money. I could not be happier with my product.
reviews.title: Beautiful product

reviews.name: Window Back Chairs - Set of 2, Black Metal / Black Vinyl Seat

reviews.title: Great chairs for the kitchen

reviews.name: Window Back Chairs - Set of 2, Black Metal / Black Vinyl Seat
reviews.reviewText: Chairs were very easy to put on the seat. Very Sturdy and comfortable.
reviews.title: Great Product for the price
